comments.html:
If you needed a final confirmation that the cloud is the new mainframe this is it.

It already ticked:

  • uses arcane syntax for configuration
  • nobody knows how it really works under the covers
  • having to re-learn everything if you move from one cloud to another

And now it also features:

  • whatever the feature is, too many people use it and therefore we'll make it backward compatible for ever

But that's not a problem, we just add one more layer of indirection :)
